original_text: All the cities had high walls around them, with gates that the people locked. There were also very many villages which did not have walls around them.
korean_text: 그 모든 성읍이 높은 성벽으로 둘려 있고 문과 빗장이 있어 견고하며 그 외에 성벽 없는 고을이 심히 많았느니라

sentences.original_text: All the cities had high walls around them
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 도시는 높은 성벽으로 둘러싸여 있었고

sentences.original_text: with gates that the people locked
There were also very many villages
which did not have walls around them
sentences.korean_translation: 그 마을들은 성벽으로 둘러싸여 있지 않았습니다
